description.value: An esthetic's tentacles are long, rubbery limbs, used to grapple and attack prey. Each tentacle can reach up to 50 feet long, but only the last 5 feet are harvestable. The rubbery skin in used in fabrics. The suction cups are used by alchemists and artificers. And while the tentacle meat has a sour chemical taste, it is still edible.
